nodes.text: The Cave of Reflection was a cave located in the Nightmare Lands on the planet Voss. During the Galactic War, the Sith Lord Renik discovered ancient tablets in the cave that allowed him to control the demented denizens of the Nightmare Lands, and he began gathering an army until Jedi Master Kelthan dispatched Republic forces to stop him and recover the source of his power.
The Cave of Reflection appears in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where it is the site of the Republic mission "Darker Than Dark."
